title: Ticket #630: CondorTest.pm fails if core files exist in log directory
description:
All of the DAGMan test scripts were failing for me, even though the actual DAGMan runs were working -- I did some debugging and tracked down that the problem is that I have some old core files hanging around in the log directory of my personal condor setup. This caused the test scripts to fail with a message like this:

Can not count</scratch.1/wenger/condor_build/condor_git/src/condor_tests/Cores/core_error_trace>:No such file or directory

This was pretty confusing, because the core files don't exist in that directory.
creator: wenger
